Molecular Dynamics¶

Slow-Growth Calculation¶

Analyze VASP REPORT File

read_report.py -n 1 -nf 1000 -p 1

-n

number of constraints

-nf

number of frames (steps)

-p

parameter plotted

thermo_integration.py -n 1 -nf 1000 -p 1

-f

filename

-nf

number of frames (steps)
